page.title: 12INTERESTING PEOPLE/ARTS
page.content: Bill Grundy T.V. Presenter Brigit Forsyth T.V. Actress Betty Driver T.V. Actress Adam Sunderland T.V. Child actor Tony Wilson T.V. Presenter Bob Scott Manager Palace Theatre Manchester Bob Geldart Artist Monty Burton Railway Enthusiast Brian Warwick Mayor of Stockport Several members of the Halle Orchestra {ARTS GROUPS / SOCIETIES Marple Arts Group Carver Theatre Marple Library Marple Brass Band Marple Choral Society Music Group, Marple and Mellor Operatic Society, Marple Poetry Group, Marple and Mellor Photographic Society Regent Cinema, Marple
